body: Starting at 8th level, whenever he gains a level, the evolutionist can change his eidolon's base form to a new base form. Once chosen, this base form is set until the evolutionist gains another summoner level. This ability replaces transposition.
name: Evolve Base Form
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Summoner/Summoner Archetypes/Evolutionist/Evolve Base Form
